<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82898</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>3871</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Intervaller (Musikk)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Intervaller (Musikk)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Intervaller (Musikk)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Intervaller (Musikk)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Intervaller (Musikk)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Intervaller (Musikk)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Intervaller (Musikk)</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learning module 'Intervaller' is intended as a first introduction to the basic music intervals. 

The learner can experiment with the representations of the intervals in the major and minor scales. This 
could be done for a while to get an understanding of the sound of the different intervals and the relationships between these.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">musikk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">intervall</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>networked</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das erlernenmodul ' Intervaller ' wird als erste 
Einleitung zu den grundlegenden Musikabständen beabsichtigt. 
Der Anfänger kann mit den Darstellungen der Abstände in den 
Haupt- und Untersatzskalen experimentieren. Dieses konnte für 
eine Weile getan werden, um ein Verständnis des Tones der 
unterschiedlichen Abstände und der Verhältnisse zwischen diesen zu 
erhalten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le module d'étude 'Intervaller 'est destiné 
comme première introduction aux intervalles de base de musique. 
L'étudiant peut expérimenter avec les représentations des 
intervalles dans les échelles principales et de mineur. Ceci a 
pu être fait pendant un moment pour obtenir un arrangement du bruit 
des différents intervalles et des rapports entre ces derniers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O módulo de aprendizagem ' Intervaller ' é 
pretendido como uma primeira introdução aos intervalos básicos da 
música. O learner pode experimentar com as respresentações 
dos intervalos nas escalas principais e do menor. Isto podia ser
feito por um quando para começar uma compreensão do som dos 
intervalos diferentes e dos relacionamentos entre estes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il modulo imparante 'Intervaller 'è inteso come 
prima introduzione agli intervalli di base di musica. Il 
principiante può sperimentare con le rappresentazioni degli 
intervalli nelle scale del minore e principali. Ciò ha potuto 
essere fatta affinchè un istante ottenga una comprensione del suono 
degli intervalli differenti e dei rapporti fra questi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ενότητα "Intervaller" εκμάθησης προορίζεται ως 
πρώτη εισαγωγή στα βασικά διαστήματα μουσικής. Ο αρχάριος 
μπορεί να πειραματιστεί με τις αντιπροσωπεύσεις των διαστημάτων 
στις σημαντικότερες και δευτερεύουσες κλίμακες. Αυτό θα 
μπορούσε να γίνει για μια στιγμή για να κατανοήσει του ήχου των 
διαφορετικών διαστημάτων και των σχέσεων μεταξύ αυτών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El módulo que aprende ' Intervaller ' se piensa 
como primera introducción a los intervalos básicos de la música. 
El principiante puede experimentar con las representaciones de 
los intervalos en las escalas principales y del menor de edad. 
Esto se podía hacer por un rato para conseguir una comprensión
del sonido de los diversos intervalos y de los lazos entre éstos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">musikk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">intervall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musikk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">intervall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">musikk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">intervall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musikk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">intervall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">musikk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">intervall</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">musikk</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">intervall</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
